about_the_game:
This is the first scene from the full version.

After Grendel Jinx is mugged, she chases after the thief, determined to retrieve her possessions - and also recruit the person responsible. For once, Grendel's lack of attention to security protocols in "The Council Of The Unseen" may have prevented further problems.

Grendel Jinx is voiced by "Sarah"
